title: Detectives Charge Suspect in Domestic-Related Homicide in Langley Park
body:
*****Spanish Translation Follows*****The Prince George’s County Police Department’s Homicide Unit arrested and charged a suspect in connection with a domestic-related homicide in Langley Park on Saturday. The suspect is 24-year-old Marciano Lucas Ramos of the 1400 . He is charged with fatally injuring 48-year-old Gumercinda Juarez-Vasquez of Langley Park. The suspect and victim were in a relationship. On November 28, 2020, at approximately 5:10 am, patrol officers responded to the 1400 block of Kanawha Street for the report of an unresponsive person. Officers located the victim inside of her home suffering from trauma. She was pronounced dead on the scene.  The preliminary investigation revealed the suspect pushed the victim during an argument causing a fatal injury to her head. Lucas Ramos is charged with first and second degree murder and additional charges. A court commissioner ordered him held without bond at the Department of Corrections. If anyone has information relevant to this investigation, they are asked to please call detectives at 301-516-2512. Callers wishing to remain anonymous may call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411-TIPS (8477), or go online at www.pgcrimesolvers.com, or use the “P3 Tips” mobile app (search “P3 Tips” in the Apple Store or Google Play to download the app onto your mobile device.) Please refer to case number 20-0055753.*****Spanish Translation Follows*****Detectives Acusan a Sospechoso en Homicidio de
Naturaleza Doméstica en Langley ParkLa Unidad de Homicidios del Departamento

años de edad y vecino de la cuadra 1400 de Kanawha Street. A este se le imputa
haber herido mortalmente a Gumercinda Juarez-Vasquez, de 48 años de edad y
vecina de Langley Park. El sospechoso y la víctima estaban en una relación.El 28 de noviembre, a eso de las 5:10
de la mañana, nuestros oficiales de patrulla acudieron a la cuadra 1400 de Kanawha
Street tras recibir información sobre una persona inconsciente. Los oficiales
hallaron a la víctima con indicios de trauma dentro de su hogar. A esta le
declararon muerta en la escena.                                                                  La investigación preliminar reveló
que el sospechoso empujó a la víctima en medio de una discusión, provocándole
una herida mortal en la cabeza.Lucas Ramos enfrenta cargos por

ordenó a que se le retuviera sin derecho a fianza en el Departamento de

que quien tenga información de relevancia para esta investigación, por favor
